Beachcomber/Smokescreen:

A stasis pod crashed from orbit a mile west of the Ark, and 8 miles south of 
the Ark.

Out of the 1 mile away Ark, a hermit crab emerged, 5 feet high and 6 feet 
wide.  "Beachcomber, maximize!" the robot transformed into his robot mode.  
"A powerful energy output is that way," he said, looking east, "must be a 
base.  I'll have to check it out.  Maybe I can find the Axalon." he jogged 
off to the Ark, the energy source.

===================

Smokescreen emerged from his stasis pod, a regular sized black and white male 
skunk.  "Smokescreen, maximize!" transforming to his robot mode, he begins to 
complain.  "Of all the rotten luck!  Smokescreen, and I'm a skunk!  This must 
be Primus' cruel idea of a joke or something!  Hey, wait a minute, that's an 
oftly large power supply...might as well check it out." he said, raising his 
electro-discharge rifle, heading off for the Ark AKA the power source.
